name: Ch.6BaseConvo2
_source: speak;Moulder;Good morning, lad.|Is there something I can do for you?
speak;Joshua;Yeah, word is you know a thing or two about using magic.|I've also heard you're good at taking hits from magic, too.
speak;Moulder;I don't know where you got such ideas from.|Though, you do learn a thing or two once you're my age.
speak;Joshua;That's what I like to hear!|Alright, magic and taking magic hits, teach me. C'mon!
speak;Moulder;Impatient, aren't you?|What is with the rush?
speak;Joshua;Let's just say I've got some...|Dealings coming in soon. I'd like to be prepared.
speak;Moulder;I see.|Unfortunately, I don't have time to teach you both.
speak;Joshua;I see...|Well, how about we make a little wager of it?
speak;Joshua;It's simple!|We'll flip a coin. If it lands on heads, you teach me magic.|If it's tails, you teach me how to defend against magic.|Deal?
speak;Moulder;I'm usually not one for chance...|But it doesn't matter to me in this case. Go ahead.
speak;Joshua;All right, then!|Let's see what lady luck has in store!
speak;Joshua;Looks like it was heads.|All right, old man, teach me some magic.
speak;Moulder;I'm not that old, but I'll teach you a thing or two.|Now, repeat after me...
alert;Joshua's MAG growth has increased by 40!
speak;Joshua;Looks like it was tails.|All right, old man, teach me how to take a magical blow.
speak;Moulder;I'm not that old, but I'll teach you a thing or two.|Now, here I come!
alert;Joshua's RES growth has increased by 40!
